words.title: convivial
words.wordDefinition: (of an atmosphere or event) friendly, lively, and enjoyable.

words.title: condign
words.wordDefinition: (of punishment or retribution) appropriate to the crime or wrongdoing; fitting and deserved.

words.title: commodious
words.wordDefinition: (especially of furniture or a building) roomy and comfortable.

words.title: conflagration
words.wordDefinition: an extensive fire which destroys a great deal of land or property

words.title: forsooth
words.wordDefinition: an extensive fire which destroys a great deal of land or property

words.title: besmirch
words.wordDefinition: damage the reputation of (someone or something) in the opinion of others
